select book_apply.*, book.*, teacher.* from book_apply, book, teacher where book_apply.bid = book.id and book_apply.tid = teacher.id and teacher.id = #{currentTeacherId}
and book.book_id like concat('%', #{bookId}, '%')
and book.book_name like concat('%', #{bookName}, '%')
and book_apply.time like concat('%', date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%')
and book_apply.status like concat('%', #{status}, '%')

select book_apply.*, book.*, teacher.*, department.* from book_apply, book, teacher, department where book_apply.bid = book.id and book_apply.tid = teacher.id and teacher.dept_id = department.id and book_apply.status <> -1
and book.book_id like concat('%', #{bookId}, '%')
and book.book_name like concat('%', #{bookName}, '%')
and teacher.tea_id like concat('%', #{teaId}, '%')
and teacher.tea_name like concat('%', #{teaName}, '%')
and teacher.dept_id like concat('%', #{deptId}, '%')
and book_apply.time like concat('%', date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%')
and book_apply.status like concat('%', #{status}, '%')

select book.book_id, book.book_name, book.book_author, book.book_press, book.book_price, book.book_num, sum(book_apply.count) as apply_count from book, book_apply where book_apply.bid = book.id
and book.book_id like concat('%', #{bookId}, '%')
and book.book_name like concat('%', #{bookName}, '%')
and book.book_press like concat('%', #{bookPress}, '%')
group by book.book_id having (apply_count - book_num) > 0
